story: It was sunrise in Great Sept of Baelor,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in The Vale of Arryn when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by making fireworks.
